name: unirend
description: A lightweight toolkit for working with both SSG (Static Site Generation) and SSR (Server-Side Rendering) in your Vite + React projects.

scripts.update-docs: markdown-toc-gen update README.md && bun run scripts/update-readme-version.ts && markdown-toc-gen update changelog.md && markdown-toc-gen update docs/api-envelope-structure.md && markdown-toc-gen update docs/error-handling.md && markdown-toc-gen update docs/mount-app-helper.md && markdown-toc-gen update docs/base-render.md && markdown-toc-gen update docs/ssg.md && markdown-toc-gen update docs/ssr.md && markdown-toc-gen update docs/server-plugins.md && markdown-toc-gen update docs/built-in-plugins.md && bun run format:docs
scripts.ssg-build-server: cd demos/ssg && vite build --outDir build/server --ssr src/entry-ssg.tsx
scripts.ssg-build: bun run ssg-build-client && bun run ssg-build-server
scripts.ssg-build-and-generate: bun run ssg-build && bun run ssg-generate
scripts.ssr-build-server: cd demos/ssr && vite build --outDir build/server --ssr src/entry-server.tsx
scripts.ssr-build: bun run ssr-build-client && bun run ssr-build-server
scripts.ssr-serve-dev: cd demos/ssr && bun run serve.ts dev
scripts.ssr-serve-prod: cd demos/ssr && bun run serve.ts prod

author: Kevin Whitman (https://github.com/keverw)
